memberdef.name: BINARY_OP
memberdef.initializer: template <class X, class Y> \ Tester& name(const X& x, const Y& y) { \ if (!(x op y)) { \ ss_ << " failed: " << x << (" " #op " ") << y; \ ok_ = false; \ } \ return *this; \ }

memberdef.name: TEST
memberdef.initializer: class TCONCAT(_Test_, name) : public base { \ public: \ void _Run(); \ static void _RunIt() { \ TCONCAT(_Test_, name) t; \ t._Run(); \ } \ }; \ bool TCONCAT(_Test_ignored_, name) = ::leveldb::test::RegisterTest( \ #base, #name, &TCONCAT(_Test_, name)::_RunIt); \ void TCONCAT(_Test_, name)::_Run()
